There is, for instance, no undue exaltation of martyrdom, no fierce sanatioal joy at the confessors’ prospect ol death Dei caussa3 they are encouraged only to hold themselves still in the calm steadfast fortitude of patient enduring faith in their Lord, and in the assurance of the abiding presence of His Spirit.
